title: BETTER
description: Have you ever had one of those encounters that changed the course of the rest of your life? Little did Allison know, she was about to.Allison Price grew up an average kid with a normal life, until, one day something so tragic, so detrimental happened, it turned her world upside down.Now she's all grown up and still being haunted by her past, that is, until a chance encounter with a stranger changes everything. Will she be able to forgive and let go of the pain of her past so that she can have a brighter future?Join Allison on her journey to become...BETTER!"BETTER",Inspirational, Motivational and highly Therapeutic!
author: N.V. Smith
